CustomField.formula: IF(StageName__c="1- Research",HYPERLINK("https://veritiv.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/Report/00O5w000006wlwt/view", StageName__c), IF(StageName__c="1- Prospect",HYPERLINK("https://veritiv.lightning.force.com/lightning/o/Opportunity/list?filterName=00B5w00000AAkGc", StageName__c), IF(StageName__c="2- Qualify",HYPERLINK("https://veritiv.lightning.force.com/lightning/o/Opportunity/list?filterName=00B5w00000AAkGm", StageName__c), IF(StageName__c="2- Qualify/Audit",HYPERLINK("https://veritiv.lightning.force.com/lightning/o/Opportunity/list?filterName=00B5w00000AAkGh", StageName__c), IF(StageName__c="3- Develop Solution",HYPERLINK("https://veritiv.lightning.force.com/lightning/o/Opportunity/list?filterName=00B5w00000AAkGw", StageName__c), IF(StageName__c="3- Project Identified",HYPERLINK("https://veritiv.lightning.force.com/lightning/o/Opportunity/list?filterName=00B5w00000AAkGr", StageName__c), IF(StageName__c="4- Demo/RFQ",HYPERLINK("https://veritiv.lightning.force.com/lightning/o/Opportunity/list?filterName=00B5w00000AAkH1", StageName__c), IF(StageName__c="4- Propose",HYPERLINK("https://veritiv.lightning.force.com/lightning/o/Opportunity/list?filterName=00B5w00000AAkH6", StageName__c), IF(StageName__c="5- Implement",HYPERLINK("https://veritiv.lightning.force.com/lightning/o/Opportunity/list?filterName=00B5w00000AAkHG", StageName__c), IF(StageName__c="5- Proposal",HYPERLINK("https://veritiv.lightning.force.com/lightning/o/Opportunity/list?filterName=00B5w00000AAkHB", StageName__c), ""))))))))))
CustomField.label: Stage Link
